MonsterTrait.Name: Sunlight Sensitivity
MonsterTrait.Text: While in sunlight, the forest marauder has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The forest marauder makes two boar spear attacks.

MonsterAction.Name: Boar Spear
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit:16 (2d10 + 5) piercing damage, and the forest marauder can choose to push the target 10 feet away if it fails a DC 16 Strength saving throw.

MonsterAction.Name: Rock
MonsterAction.Text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 19 (3d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage.
